qas.question: When did the Gempei War begin?
When did the Gempei War end?
Which clans fought in the Gempei War?
What does the Shimonoseki Strait divide?
When was the Kamakura Shogunate established?

context: <a2_0>The Taira and the Minamoto<a2_0/> clashed again in <a0_0>1180<a0_0/>, beginning the Gempei War, which ended in <a1_0>1185<a1_0/>. Samurai fought at the naval battle of Dan-no-ura, at the Shimonoseki Strait which separates <a3_0>Honshu and Kyushu<a3_0/> in 1185. The victorious Minamoto no Yoritomo established the superiority of the samurai over the aristocracy. In 1190 he visited Kyoto and in <a4_0>1192<a4_0/> became Sei'i-taishōgun, establishing the Kamakura Shogunate, or Kamakura Bakufu. Instead of ruling from Kyoto, he set up the Shogunate in Kamakura, near his base of power. "Bakufu" means "tent government", taken from the encampments the soldiers would live in, in accordance with the Bakufu's status as a military government.
